metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7960 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
OpenStack Object Storage (Swift) before 2.2.0 allows remote authenticated users to bypass the max_meta_count and other metadata constraints via multiple crafted requests which exceed the limit when combined.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-swift - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2
swift - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2
swift-account - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2
swift-container - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2
swift-object - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2
swift-object-expirer - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2
swift-proxy - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: jdstrand> per upstream, this is a minor issue

criterions.comment: swift package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.1-0ubuntu1.2').
